item.title: 136 - Single Number
item.description: leetcode Problem Given a non-empty array of integers, every element appears twice except for one. Find that single one. Note: Your algorithm should have a linear runtime complexity. Could you implement it without using extra memory? Example 1: Input: [2,2,1] Output: 1 Example 2: Input: [4,1,2,1,2] Output: 4 Notes Solution 1: Hash Table Solution 2: Bit manipulation Consider XOR all element together. The left number is the single number. Solution Solution 1: Hash Table class Solution: def singleNumber(self, nums): table = {} for i in nums: table[i] = table.
